content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace Group at positions (1, 1) and (3, 0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position (1, 1)) and its fuel source (coal) with an inventory of iron-ore and producing iron-plates.
- Stone furnace (position (3, 0)) and its fuel source (coal) with an inventory of iron-ore and producing iron-plates.

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting iron ore into the furnaces
- Ensure that the furnaces have enough space in their inventory to accept the iron ore before inserting.

### Errors when extracting from the furnaces
- Make sure to extract items from the furnaces only when they have produced items; check the inventory of the furnaces to confirm they contain the expected output before extraction.

### Errors when using stale entity data
- Regularly refresh the entity data to ensure that you are working with the most current information about the entities on the map.
